Key.English: Faction of the units to be placed (BLU_F,OPF_F)
Priority of the custom objective. Used by OPCOM and others for target evaluation
Key.Chinesesimp: 自定义目标的优先级,用于OPCOM和其他目标评估

Key.English: Size of the custom objective. Used by OPCOM and others for target evaluation
Key.Chinesesimp: 自定义目标的大小。用于OPCOM和其他目标评估

Key.English: A group's behaviour determines how it is units move from one point to another, behave when idle, and how they engage an enemy.
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个团队的行为决定了它的单位如何从一个点移动到另一个点，空闲时的行为，以及他们如何与敌人交战

Key.English: Set classname of Infantry group to be spawned, set to empty for random. If vehicle classname is set, this will be ignored.
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置要生成的步兵组的类名，随机设置为空。如果设置了车辆类名，这个将被忽略。

Key.English: Set classname of Vehicle to be spawned. If empty, Infantry group will be spawned.
Key.Chinesesimp: 设置要生成的载具的类名。如果是空的，则会生成步兵组。

Key.English: If set to no, vehicle will be spawned with AI crew.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果设置为否，载具将拥有AI成员

Key.English: Place the Spearhead Custom Military Objective module in the editor, select the desired Size, Priority and force. Custom factions can be entered in the text box (separated by a comma).
Key.Chinesesimp: 在编辑器中放置Spearhead自定义军事目标模块，选择所需的大小，优先级和力量。可以在文本框中输入自定义派系(以逗号分隔)
C2ISTAR军事进攻/军事防御任务
